wikipedia_page.main: Horace Osborne Robotham (12 June 1879 – 12 September 1916) was an English professional football right half who played in the Football League for Glossop and Wolverhampton Wanderers. He also played in the Southern League for Fulham, New Brompton and Brentford.

response: * Private Harry Robotham, killed during the Battle of Flers–Courcelette on 12 September 1916, while serving with the Middlesex Regiment.
